title: What Will Teams Who Acquired Extra Picks Do? + Answering Listener Questions
itunes:title: What Will Teams Who Acquired Extra Picks Do? + Answering Listener Questions
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys break down what teams who acquired extra picks through trades will do in the draft (2:03). Then, the duo discuss cluster rankings of draft prospects and compare players across positions (15:45). Next, Bucky talks about his conversation with Falcons GM Thomas Dimitroff and how the team could potentially have 11 first-round picks starting on offense this upcoming season (24:09). After that, DJ and Bucky answer listener questions (32:42). To wrap up the show, the guys explain how to get into the scouting world and give their own stories (39:14).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
